body: Update: Added many tests for the `UsernameCaseMapped` profile cribbed from the [Java precis implementation](https://bitbucket.org/sco0ter/precis) for babbler which is also being worked on at the moment. A few of them have different results and I'm trying to figure out why / who's right. It's hard to write (or steal) tests when you're not sure what the actual result isâ€¦ we're discussing collaborating on a standard set of test vectors though for a future RFC.
